Articles.Content:
The Big S wings are awesome, being that they're wet wings.

But we're sadly lacking in options with them, shapewise, especially.

My first proposal is a 60deg delta of the same span as the existing 45deg one, also a similarly scaled trapezoidal wing would be incredibly useful.

Does anybody else wish there was more to the Big S parts?
I think that all wings (except the ones that can move, of course) should have the option to be wet.
I'd like to see some BigS swept wings.

> 
> I'd like to see some BigS swept wings.

Well, we've got the FAT wings for that, but yeah we could do with some more options in that department as well
We need big-s wing boards too. And a small triangular delta wing for the edges of the wing board wings. Composite wings with fuel would be great for huge planes.
